## Description {#details}

The DeadArgumentHacking pass, same as dead argument elimination, but deletes arguments to functions which are external.

This is only for use by bugpoint.

Definition at line 105 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp">DeadArgumentElimination.cpp</a>.
